head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, BRIAN T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, BRIAN T.

block.p: MURPHY--Brian T., of Bronxville, on April 4th, 2007. Husband of Julia McKeon Murphy. Father of Allison S. Woods and Claire K. Murphy. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville between the hours of 2 to 4 and 7 to 9pm, Monday and Tuesday. Mass of Christian burial, St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville, on Wednesday, April 11, at 9:45am. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to St. Brigid's Church, 409 Linden St., Brooklyn, NY 11237 or Outreach Ministry, C/O Reformed Church, Bronxville, NY 10708.
